carpeta_disco_videoteca_obligatorio: Folder on disk that contains the videos *
mensaje_descripcion_crear_biblioteca: Create your video library with your best memories in video format.
mensaje_pantalla_bienvenida: From this section you will have access to the photographs that users have published.
password_edicion: Password (If you do not enter the password, it will not be modified)
mensaje_descripcion_edicion_album: Modify the name and / or description of the album. You can indicate if it is public or not, in this way you can decide if you only see it or if anyone can see it.
mensaje_descripcion_crear_album: Create your photo album with a name and a description. You can indicate if it is public or not, in this way you can decide if only you see it or if anyone can see it. You can even restrict access to the album to certain users.
adjuntar_videos_videoteca: Attach videos to the video library
mensaje_pantalla_bienvenida_videotecas: From this section you will have access to the public video libraries of the users.
